data.title: AR38: Tribute to 38 Special & Atlanta Rhythm Section 2024
data.meta_description: AR38 combines the musical talents of Tribute bands from the Atl to faithfully recreate the hits of 38 Special & Atlanta Rhythm Section.
data.text:
In the world of Rock Music, 38 Special and Atlanta Rhythm Section stand as icons of the southern rock. AR38 are proud to honor their music legacy by bringing these great songs to life.

AR38 is made up with members of popular Tribute bands in the Atlanta area. Singer, Downey Poteat is from Headgames(Foreigner Tribute) and Bad Co. Experience. Guitarist/Vocalist, Jim Withrow is from Kanstyx(Kansas & Styx Tribute) and Bad Co. Experience. Keyboardist/Vocalist, Don McBroom is from Bad Co. Experience. Bassist, Tommy Williams is from Kanstyx(Kansas & Styx Tribute). Add our talented drummer, Mitch Flanders and our multi-talented guitarist, Zach King and you have a professional tribute band that faithfully re-creates, vocally and musically, these hit songs with expert musicianship and attention to detail. AR38 does NOT use any pre-recorded backing tracks. All vocals and instruments are performed 100% completely live!

TICKETS

VIP TABLES

– 2 seats per VIP table (sold separately)

– Complimentary bottle of Champagne per table (or two free drinks per person)

– Tableside service for concessions/drinks
